text: When you are unwell and cannot visit the branch due to physical disability, we will assist by visiting your doorstep and fulfil financial requirements.We will also assist in adding a Mandate Holder to your account; he/she can make hassle free transactions on your behalf.

elements.text: Settlement of Claims - We work hard and strive to provide financial security to our loved ones. We always worry about how to secure our loved ones future so that they do not face any problems in terms of financial security even after us. Settlement of Claims is very easy with Ujjivan Bank as we have a simple process and our staff will assist claimants at every step.
